item.title: More fly tipping at regular estate site, 7th November
item.description:
The door to this estate chute has been broken for well over a year. I have reported it several times. Fly tipping is frequent here.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lauriston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing Wheelie Bins, 7th November
item.description:
Outside 16-18 Haldane Road and on the corner of 6 Wallace Close. Unfortunately the wheelie bins have been filled with rubbish (not recyclable) and have been left overflowing. This has caused litter to be blown all over the neighbourhood. Could you arrange for the bins to be emptied please? There is a brown garden waste bin, also full of rubbish, that has been abandoned. I’m happy to do a litter pick (as a Bexley volunteer) once the main rubbish has been cleared. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wallace Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet
